name: Demon Hunt Legend Wars: The Adventurers
name_original: Demon Hunt Legend Wars: The Adventurers
description:
An Insanely FUN GAME!

Let's have fun with just tap tap and tap on screen. This's so simple but awesome gameplay. You need to wait for the right moment to place your finger to beat the game. It's perfect to kill your freetime. Try it yourself now.

Are you ready? ... "PLAY IT NOW!"
